description:
Do you like snow?  Now you can watch snow fall any time of year no matter the weather outside!  With Snowfall, you can watch snow falling on a variety of winter scenes.  Snowfall includes both hand-drawn scenes and photographs, and you can select or deselect them as you wish.  Snow builds up the longer an image stays on the screen.

NOTE 1: To access the settings window, press and hold on the screen for one second.
NOTE 2: For information on how to use Snowfall in Exhibition, open the app from the launcher and check the top left App Menu.

Features:

* 15 unique winter scenes
* 12- or 24-hour clock with six different positions on the screen (including "hidden")
* 5 wind speeds, from "None" to "Blizzard"
* Advance to the next scene every 5, 10, 30, or 60 minutes
* Enable or disable scenes as you see fit
* Watch snow collect on the screen the longer a scene is shown
